TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody1: 3 Shake symbols appearing anywhere on reels 2, 3 and 4 triggers the Bonus Feature.
TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody2: During Bonus Feature, shake the Tree of Fortune to reveal prize won. Shake the Tree of Fortune again to reveal 8 Golden Packets.
TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody3: 3 Golden Packet picks are given during the Bonus Feature.
TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody4: Tap on a Golden Packet to reveal either coin wins, additional picks or "Refill".
TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody5: Only one Golden Packet can be selected at a time.
TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody6: If selected Golden Packet reveals "+2", 2 additional Golden Packet picks are given respectively.
TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody7: If selected Golden Packet reveals "Refill", the Bonus Feature is retriggered when no more Golden Packet picks are available.
TOFCommonRules.RulesFeatureBody8: If 8 new Golden Packets are revealed twice due to selected Golden Packet revealing "Refill", the 3rd set of Golden Packets will not have Golden Packet with "Refill".
TOFCommonRules.RulesGeneralBody14: Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Shake symbol.
TOFCommonRules.RulesGeneralBody15: Shake symbol and Wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3 and 4 only.
TOFCommonRules.RulesRedPacketsBody1: Each Red Packet symbol appearing anywhere on reels will fly up to the Tree of Fortune. It may land on an empty spot or on a previously placed Red Packet.
TOFCommonRules.RulesRedPacketsBody3: If the Red Packet symbol lands on an empty spot in the Tree of Fortune, a Red Packet will appear on the spot it landed on.
TOFCommonRules.RulesRedPacketsBody4: If the Red Packet symbol lands on a previously placed Red Packet in the Tree of Fortune, that previously placed Red Packet will grow larger.
TOFCommonRules.RulesRedPacketsBody5: There can be at most 5 Red Packet on the Tree of Fortune in any spin.
TOFCommonRules.RulesRedPacketsBody6: For each Red Packet on the Tree of Fortune, it can be at level 1 to level 5, where on the 5th level, the Red Packet on the Tree of Fortune will open to reveal either 2, 3 or 5 free spins won.

TOFGameRules.RulesGeneralBody1: Tree of Fortune is a 5-reel, 3-row video slot featuring Red Packets growing on the Tree of Fortune which awards free spins and Golden Packets selection during Bonus Feature.

RulesGeneralBody2.value: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), bet level of %{minBetMtp} to %{maxBetMtp} and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
RulesGeneralBody2.comment: %{minBetMtp}, %{maxBetMtp}, %{minChip}, %{maxChip} will be replaced with game specific configurations
RulesGeneralBody2.example: The game is played with 30 bet lines (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of 0.01 to 10.

TOFGameRules.RulesGeneralBody16: Free spins are played at the same bet size and bet level as the spin that triggered the free spins.
TOFGameRules.RulesGeneralBody17: The state of the game is saved for each Bet Amount. When a different Bet Amount is chosen, the corresponding state of the game is applied.
TOFGameRules.RulesRedPacketsBody2: Wild symbol does not fly up to the Tree of Fortune.
TOFGameRules.RulesRedPacketsBody8: Free spin wins are added to "Win" meter.
TOFGameRules.RulesRedPacketsBody9: Shake symbol does not appear in free spin.
